2f00020063cbce94643fdc198dc69b7693382f58.commitMessage: Issue #5008: increased pitest of coding package

c0446a825514ea0279b8c22f633f2c4e3c73dc1f.commitMessage:
Fix PMD violations from UseVarargs rule, issue #999

The changes are fully backward-compatible. Method with vararg can be invoked both using array and list of parameters.

dfc803a1cc442bafeb5aa375f0d9f0a31d655ff2.commitMessage:
Use Collections.addAll() instead of adding elements individually

As per javadoc, `Collections.addAll()` may be significantly faster than adding elements individually using a for loop.

e50e1fcd1c17ba1f73d11df38382907cc163a1d1.commitMessage:
Use the new syntactic sugar "for loop".

End of the cosmetic changes.

ea4085cd15fefe1e70a495798187c425295c74b6.commitMessage:
Fix for rfe 1248106 (TYPECAST is now accepted by NoWhitespaceAfter)

Fix for rfe 953266 (thanks to Paul Guyot (pguyot) for submitting patch)
IllegalType can be configured to accept some abstract classes which
matches to regexp of illegal type names (property legalAbstractClassNames)

TrailingComment now can be configured to accept some trailing comments
(such as NOI18N) (property legalComment, rfe 1385344).
